text: Ričardas Zdančius (born 17 January 1967 in Gargždai) is a former Lithuanian professional footballer, member of the Lithuania national team. He won a total of 24 international caps, scoring 4 goals for the Lithuania national football team. ==Honours== * Baltic Cup ** 1996 ==External links== * Short bio Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:FC Flora players Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:FC Zugdidi players Category:People from Gargždai Category:Association football defenders
title: Ričardas Zdančius
